title: Collaborative Learning Course for Enhancing Animal Behavior and Welfare Attitudes

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of animal biology and experience using online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Online course for science field professionals to improve awareness of animal welfare. Construction of a collaborative learning environment based on the Community of Inquiry (CoI) framework, utilizing social presence, teaching presence, and cognitive dissonance strategies

learning_goals: Learners understand basic ethology theories and can analyze animal welfare issues based on scientific evidence.
Learners enhance their ability to resolve attitudinal dissonance related to animal welfare by interacting with peers and instructors in online discussion forums.
Learners propose practical solutions for improving animal welfare and demonstrate effective communication skills in a global learner network.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
